biotools.summary: A 4-D image processing platform for the work with laser scanning and wide field microscopes. It provides a registration software for correcting global movements and local deformations of cells as well as 2-D and 3-D tracking software.

bioschemas.name: TIKAL
bioschemas.summary: A 4-D image processing platform for the work with laser scanning and wide field microscopes. It provides a registration software for correcting global movements and local deformations of cells as well as 2-D and 3-D tracking software.
